law.catch_line: Appointment of members of Agritourism Advisory Council -- Chair -- Meetings -- Vacancies -- Compensation.

text.section: Members of the Agritourism Advisory Council shall be appointed for four (4) year terms. Sitting members shall be eligible for reappointment.
The Agritourism Advisory Council shall elect a chair and vice chair from its membership.

The Agritourism Advisory Council shall meet annually or at the request of the chair. A quorum of the council shall consist of fourteen (14) members, and a majority of members present at any duly called meeting may act upon any matter before it for consideration.
In the event of a vacancy, the appropriate appointing entity may appoint a replacement member who shall hold office during the remainder of the term so vacated.
Members of the Agritourism Advisory Council shall serve without compensation.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 5, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 250, sec. 5, effective July 15, 2002.
